name: Magento Fashion Theme
short_description:
Demama Fashion is a young, modern and responsive magento Fashion theme that is a perfect choice for Fashion store, Clothes store, Trendy Fashion store, Bags Store, Shoes Store, Accessories shop, Jewelry store. Ves Demama Fashion comes with responsive design and white background color that draw shopper’s attention to the most important part of your website- products.

Not only built with Bootstrap 3, HTML5, CSS 3, Font Awesome 4, Demama Fashion also offer amazing must have Magento features such as Mega Menu, Layer Slider, Quick View Product, product Carousel, Brand slider, magento blog extension, seo optimized, product hover effect, multi currency, multi language, live theme customizer, pagebuilder, shopping cart magento extension and much more.

Especially, Demama Fashion is built by our drag & drop Page Builder that let you both create and customize you theme easily without touching any single code line. To support you install faster, we bring you Magento Quick Start Package
summary: A responsive magento fashion theme for Fashion store, Clothes store, T
